answers.answer: You're a bit young for it, but you might be suffering from acid reflux. If it doesn't improve I would see your doctor.

Zoelula:  I dont get heart burn or any of the other symptoms associated with acid reflux.  i made an appointment to see the Dr. on friday, hopefully he can at least give me something.  I'm currently living off of dry toast and water... :(
Sounds rough, I hope he figures it out, or at least gives you something for the symptoms. Another possibility is gastoparesis, though that usually leads to erratic blood sugars as well.

question: I'm 28 and have had diabetes since i was 15. I have been on an inuslin pump for 3 years now and my blood sugars are well controled. Recently i've been getting very nauseated after eating, to the point that I do not want to eat.  About 25 to 50 minutes after eating I begin to feel as though the food is coming back up and become more and more nauseated but  I do not vomit.At first I thougth it was a virus but it has been a good 3 weeks now...Any ideas what this could be?
title: Eating makes me sick...
